name: 2021 3rd International Workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Education
content: All submissions will be blind reviewed by the Technical Committees on the basis of technical quality, relevance to conference topics of interest, originality, significance, and clarity. Accepted and selected papers will be recommended to be published in the Conference Publishing Services (CPS) by IEEE, which could be submitted for IEEE Xploreâ„¢, for indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus Index.
